mapper.sql: id, role_name, role_code, description, deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select r.id, r.role_name, r.role_code, r.description, r.create_time, r.update_time, group_concat(distinct p.name) as permission_names, group_concat(distinct p.permission_code) as permission_codes from sys_role r left join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id and rp.deleted = 0 left join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id and p.deleted = 0 where r.deleted = 0 and r.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%') and r.role_code like concat('%', #{roleCode}, '%') group by r.id
select p.* from sys_permission p inner join sys_role_permission rp on p.id = rp.permission_id where rp.role_id = #{roleId} and p.deleted = 0 and rp.deleted = 0
SELECT r.* FROM sys_role r INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_role WHERE role_code = #{roleCode} AND deleted = 0
